segments.text: I see the water just spilling over the sink, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little world, completely ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she’s just standing there, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just running and running, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s even aware of what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get into so much trouble if she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
